import React from "react"; const tempInfo = { "cardTotal": 3, "currentCard": 1, "prompt": "????????????????????????????", "answer": "Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah ", "flipped": false } export default function displayCard(){ if(tempInfo.flipped === false){ return (
Card {tempInfo.currentCard} of {tempInfo.cardTotal}

{tempInfo.prompt}

) } return (
Card {tempInfo.currentCard} of {tempInfo.cardTotal}

{tempInfo.content}

) }
